stripped_text: The first time each turn you use hardware during a run, place 1 power counter on this resource. click, remove this resource from the game: Shuffle up to X cards with trash abilities from your heap into your stack. X is double the number of hosted power counters.
text: The first time each turn you use hardware during a run, place 1 power counter on this resource. [click], remove this resource from the game: Shuffle up to X cards with [trash] abilities from your heap into your stack. X is double the number of hosted power counters.
title: The Back
